text: Wishbone Ash is the first studio album by British rock band Wishbone Ash. It was released on 4 December 1970. It reached number 29 on the UK Albums Chart in 1971. ==Track listing== "Blind Eye" and "Queen of Torture" were released on 7" single, MCA MK5061 (Decca 32826 in US) (February 1971) ==Personnel== *Andy Powell - lead guitar, vocals *Ted Turner - lead guitar, vocals *Martin Turner - bass, vocals *Steve Upton - drums *Matthew Fisher - piano on Blind Eye ==References== Category:1970 albums Category:Hard rock albums Category:Debut albums
title: Wishbone Ash (album)
